article_metadata.title: Jeb Bush: Supreme Court picks will differ from his father’s | The State

og.description: Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush said in Greenville Friday that he wouldn’t repeat the mistake his father made in picking David Souter to serve on the United States Supreme Court.
